name: Carl Paolino
bio: Hi! I'm a passionate computer science student at Georgia Tech with experience in full-stack development, planning to graduate in Spring 2027. I am currently contracting for Foundry AI and I will be interning at GTRI in Spring 2026, working within the Autonomy Technology Transition Division.
